text: Gołocin is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Chojnów, within Legnica County, Lower Silesian Voivodeship, in south-western Poland. Prior to 1945 it was in Germany. It lies approximately south-east of Chojnów, west of Legnica, and west of the regional capital Wrocław. ==References== Category:Villages in Legnica County
title: Gołocin, Lower Silesian Voivodeship
